text: Alexander Nollenberger (born 4 June 1997) is a German footballer who plays as a midfielder for SpVgg Bayreuth. ==Career== Nollenberger made his 3. Liga debut for Bayern Munich II on 30 July 2019, coming on as a substitute in the 79th minute for Joshua Zirkzee in the away match against Hansa Rostock, which finished as a 1–2 loss.
